name: Aloneland
description:
What do you do when you are alone on the island? Do you survive? 

This game let you to check it. 

You can pick up, craft and cook in the game. Try to find the way how to escape.

Version 1.1 Bugs fixes:

- fix problem with 'teleport' player on pause
- fix problem with animations (fish etc.)
- fix problem with menu (back to menu didn't work)
